meanings.definition: A short film or video that is a special feature on a DVD or Blu-ray.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed watching the featurettes about the making of the movie on the DVD.
meanings.sent2: The DVD included featurettes showcasing behind-the-scenes footage.
meanings.sent3: The featurettes on the DVD were so interesting that I watched them twice.
meanings.sent4: The featurettes on the DVD were like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The featurettes on the DVD brought the movie's production process to life.

meanings.definition: A small feature or distinctive attribute.
meanings.sent1: Her smile was the most charming featurette of her personality.
meanings.sent2: The quaint little garden had many lovely featurettes, like a tiny fountain.
meanings.sent3: His quirky sense of humor was a delightful featurette that always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The small butterfly tattoo on her wrist was a unique featurette that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The featurette of her dimples added to her overall charm and warmth.
